p: During hospitalisation, most of the patients received hydroxychloroquine ± azithromycin (427, 79.2%) and low weight heparin at prophylactic doses (355, 65.8%), 134 (24.8%) received antivirals (lopinavir/r or darunavir/c in 126, remdesivir n 8 cases), 122 (22.6%) corticosteroids and 43 (8.0%) immunomodulatory drugs. More than half of the patients were given combinations including hydroxychloroquine + heparin ± lopinavir/r or darunavir/c or azithromycin (301, 55.8%).
